gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.tree
Class TreeDefaultDragTransferHandler

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.tree.TreeDefaultDragTransferHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
TargetTreeDragTransferHandler
public class TreeDefaultDragTransferHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent

Implement full drag and drop handling. As of version 1.0, this class only handles drag from the tree.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:25 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $

Field Detail

RCSID

public static java.lang.String RCSID
String that identifies the class version and solves the serial version UID problem. This String is for informational purposes only and MUST not be made final.

See Also:
JBuilder vice javac serial version UID

getTree

public javax.swing.JTree getTree()

initDragAndDrop

protected void initDragAndDrop()
set up the drag and drop listeners. This must be called after the constructor.

move

public void move()
Called by the DragSourceAdapter in dragDropEnd if the operation is DnDConstants.ACTION_MOVE

Specified by:
move in interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent

getDragAction

public int getDragAction()
What are the drag actions supported by this component. Could be DnDConstants.ACTION_MOVE, DnDConstants.ACTION_COPY or DnDConstants.ACTION_COPY_OR_MOVE. Called by the DragSourceAdapter in dragDropEnd and the DragGestureAdapter in dragGestureRecognized

Specified by:
getDragAction in interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent

getDragStartData

public java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable getDragStartData(java.awt.dnd.DragGestureEvent e)
Called by the DragGestureAdapter in dragGestureRecognized

Specified by:
getDragStartData in interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent

getDragSourceListener

public java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener getDragSourceListener()
Called by the DragGestureAdapter in dragGestureRecognized. This is the listener that is registered with the drag source in the startDrag method.

Specified by:
getDragSourceListener in interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent
Returns:
usually the DragSourceAdapter

isStartDragOk

public boolean isStartDragOk(java.awt.dnd.DragGestureEvent e)
Is the location within the component draggable? Called by the DragGestureAdapter in dragGestureRecognized. If false is returned then there will be no drag initiated.

Specified by:
isStartDragOk in interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent

setInDragDropMode

public void setInDragDropMode(boolean flag)
Because when a drag is over a component, a selection listener would be notified as if there were an item being selected. These two function will allow DropTargetAdapter to notify the selection listener(s) of the drop target component if the drag comes or the actual selection occurs.

Specified by:
setInDragDropMode in interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent

isInDragDropMode

public boolean isInDragDropMode()
Answers if current component is under dragging mode.

Specified by:
isInDragDropMode in interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent
Returns:
if current component is under dragging mode.
